name: GERAES (1976)
description:
Milton Nascimento (Portuguese pronunciation: ['miwtõ nasiˈmẽtu]; born October 26, 1942) is a Brazilian singer-songwriter and multi-instrumentalist, known globally as one of the most influential and talented Brazilian musicians.[citation needed] Elis Regina once stated that "if God had a voice, it would be Milton's."[This quote needs a citation]

A unique and baroque voice combined with poetic lyrics, his music mesmerizes people all over the world. He has toured in North America, South America, Asia, Africa, and Europe. Nascimento is also highly praised in the music industry, having won 5 Grammy Awards, including Best World Music Album in 1997.
